title: Brace Yourself!
info: Increase hero armor by 2
lore: Only a fool travels a battlefield with their shield relaxed. - Thorisus Maghartus

title: Concentrate
info: Increase hero armor by 3
lore: Keep an open mind to new ideas, and a hardened mind to old tricks - Magus Dhyffrys.

title: Find Cover
info: Increase hero armor by 4
lore: A large nearby boulder provides a time-honoured method to absorb some damage.

title: Reinfornced Defense
info: decrease next enemy attack by up to 3 damage until next turn

title: Stoneskin
info: decrease next enemy attack by up to 5 damage until next turn

title: Riposte
info: apply spikes for 1 turn

title: Defensive Potency
info: Increase hero armor by 8

title: Defensive Planning
info: roll d6, 3 to dodge

title: Spikeskin
info: Apply spikes for 4 turns

title: Doubledodge
info: roll d6 twice. > 3 to dodge

title: Defensive Efficiency
info: double your armor

title: King's Defense
info: Increase armor by 3, double your armor.

title: Parry
info: Play face down. Next physical attack against you is ignored, your opponent's turn ends.

title: Wear-Down
info: destroy 2 MP, 2HP of opponent
lore: Give them the runaround, until they can no longer run around - Master Tactician Colin

title: Degrade Armor
info: destroy 3HP, 3 Armor of opponent
lore: I suggest you sit down, ask for help, and get used to it. - Borne Aarthard

title: Sunder Armor
info: destroy 2MP, 2HP, 2 Armor of opponent
lore: Hit them where it's supposed to hurt until it hurts. - Unknown persistent soldier

title: Weak
info: Enemy is weakened for next 2 turns, 1 less physical damage for next 2 turns

title: Slow
info: Enemy has 2 less MP for the next 2 turns.

title: Leech
info: Enemy loses 4HP over the next 2 turns and you receive it as health.

title: Choke
info: Enemy loses 5 HP and loses 1MP next 2 turns.

title: Drench
info: Enemy is drenched for 2 turns. Any electric attacks deal 200%.

title: Paralyze
info: Enemy is paralyzed for 2 turns. Each turn, enemy has x+10% chance to break out of it.

title: Insanity
info: Enemy is insane for 2 turns. All card costs are randomized (+/-4). If enemy spends 5 MP on cards, insanity is removed.

title: Confuse
info: Enemy is confused for 2 turns.

title: Dessicate
info: Enemy is dessicated. Fire attacks deal 200% damage

title: Damage Inversion
info: Play face down. Flip up and all attacks against you are instead healing you for the damaged recieved.
lore: All enemy's attacks up to 4 damage heal instead for the next 2 turns.

title: Attack
info: Deal 1 damage to opponent
lore: The most primitive methods of getting what you want are sometimes within arms reach.

title: Burn
info: Deal 2 damage to opponent
lore: Humanity has a cruel and ironic tendency to burn and stone things it doesn't understand

title: Shock
info: Deal 3 damage to opponent
lore: Once the current of the heavens had been harnessed, quality of life was improved for all those who treaded carefully.

title: Cleave
info: Deal 4 damage to opponent. Roll d6 >3 for additional 2 damage.

title: Medium Attack
info: Deal 6 damage to opponent

title: Electrocute
info: Medium attack d6 >3 for 1 turn of paralysis

title: Torch
info: Medium attack d6 >3 for 2 turn of burn

title: Blast
info: Deal 8 damage to opponent

title: Tackle
info: deal 5 damage to oppnent. Roll d6 6, and it will move to knock out the other player.

title: Jettison
info: Discard a cards. Add their cost, deal half as damage to enemy.
lore: Your axe gets lighter if you get rid of the hilt, and hey! Your axe is now part of your forearm! - Cubby McClubkin.

title: Meatshield
info: Gain armor equal to 8 of enemy's HP. Damage enemy for 4HP.

title: Ignite
info: Very Hard attack with DOT

title: Steelstorm
info: Play face-down. Flip up during an attack phase. This phase, alll direct damage spells deal 2 extra damage each.
lore: Very Hard Attack with AOE chance of paralysis

title: Pray
info: Restore 4HP to your hero
lore: In this day and age, the ones above us usually don't screen their calls.

title: Cleanse
info: Restore 6HP to your hero
lore: The regrowing arts sometimes regrows a bit too much, so it leave some options to dispose with the extra... you.

title: Clinical Heal
info: Restore 8HP to your hero
lore: Sometimes seeing an expert with the right resources is what you really need.

title: Regen
info: heal 2 hp/ turn for 3 turns

title: Insight
info: take a card out of your discard deck up to 3 cost and play it

title: Calm
info: Next turn, enemy player loses up to 3 MP

title: Strong
info: for the next 3 turns, attack cards deal 3 extra damage

title: Bless Armor
info: for the next 3 turns, nullify up to 4 damage per turn.

title: Great Heal
info: heal yourself for 9HP

title: Haste
info: give yourself 2 more MP per turn for the next 3 turns

title: Absolve
info: clear yourself of all negative ailments, deal 6hp to enemy and heal 6 HP

title: Full Heal
info: fully heal yourself

title: Angel
info: Play face down. For the next 3 turns, prevents one death, and gives a rez to 1/4 HP
lore: In the stories of the young, some tell of a being who rescues those in peril, but only when enough loose mana is around
